summary: HOW CAN WE TRUST THE INFORMATION THAT TAKATA IS RELEASING REGARDING THE AIR BAG RECALL WHEN THEY HAVE BLATANTLY LIED FOR YEARS ABOUT THE PROBLEM. MY VIN IS NOT LISTED ON THE WEBSITE, BUT I LIVE IN FLORIDA AND THEY HAVE INDICATED THAT FLORIDA WEATHER IS A MAJOR CONTRIBUTING FACTOR TO THE RECALL ISSUE.    CAN I DEMAND THAT THEY REPLACE MY AIR BAGS AS A PRECUTIONARY MEASURE?
